Middle Tennesseans call or text me about this every day. We have had the worst #COVID19 management of any nation.
We can and must keep the Supreme Court from veering more to the right and killing our health care.

The best ways to stop McConnell & the anti-health care Repubs are
A) raise hell in the Senate to prevent a quick replacement of RBG, 
B) help more Americans understand that they will all need health care, especially people w/ pre-existing conditions (which is almost everyone!).

On Nov. 10, the Supreme Court will hear a Texas case that could cripple, even kill, the ACA, the Obama-led law that has done more to provide health care for all than anything in our country's history. We need to make sure that the anti-health people don't win in the Court in Nov.
Getting health care for all is the number one issue in the November election. Democrats are for universal coverage; Republicans are not.
